                    Concordia
                    Directories
 Search 
 Concordia University 
 Recruitment events 
 We travel the world meeting with future students and talking about all the doors a Concordia education can open. Our recruiters will share what they love about life in Montreal, considered the best student city in North America. Also covered: how to apply, paid internships and study abroad.
